content: materials - 1 skein of purl soho s home life 1 100% cotton each skein is 61 yards/ 33 grams approximately 60 yards required - us 6 4 mm straight or 16- or 20-inch circular needles 2 - if using straight needles two us 6 double pointed needles 3 for i-cord our home life washcloth bundle includes everything you ll need to make 3 washcloths in a cotton pouch choose from 6 palettes millet cameo lichen eucalyptus ocean air and sweet pea note this bundle is no longer available gauge 20½ stitches = 4 inches in garter stitch unlaundered note the row gauge in this pattern is not listed because you are simply knitting to a desired length any row gauge will do as long as your stitch gauge is correct size finished dimensions unlaundered approximately 7¾ x 7¾ inches finished dimensions laundered approximately 6½ x 6½ inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/home-life html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888
